data.title: Obama Taps 2 For Court Of Federal Claims Bench
data.meta_description: President Barack Obama has nominated the general counsel of the U.S. Office of Personnel Management and the chief special master of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims to judgeships on that court, the White House said Wednesday.
